content: this is a link to an internet archive and might not always be available **materials ** 5 skeins 240 yds each winter white -- main color 2 skeins turquoise 2 skeins green 1 grape 1 red and 1 orange 1 knitting needle size 50 1 crochet hook size k **gauge ** 5 pattern repeats 5 sts each = 5 ½ inches 5 row = 5 inches
